post:
XLvps is the newly formed sister company of TheNewsgroups.com (TNG).  TNG has been in business since 1998 as a premium Usenet provider.

To help celebrate this new business, we would like to extend the following offer to LET members.

XLvps Linux KVM & Usenet Access

•1024MB RAM

•1024MB Swap

•2 CPU Cores

•50GB Diskspace

•500GB Bandwidth

•1Gbps Port Speed

•1 IPv4 Address

•KVM/Virtualizor

•2GB/Day Premium Usenet Access  

•Locations: Phoenix & Chicago

•$7/Month | [LINK](https://www.xlvps.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=1&carttpl=cart)

Our VPS nodes currently reside in the PhoenixNap, Equinix/Chicago, and SecureNet/South Florida. We will be adding nodes in Europe and Canada in the up coming months.

This offer is for the Phoenix and Chicago locations.

While your VPS account is active, you will also receive a premium UseNet access account from TheNewsgroups.com. This account will allow you to access all of the premium newsgroups and allows you to download 2GB/Day. This account will remain active for the duration of their VPS subscription.

We offer pretty much every flavor of Linux and will upload custom .ISOs upon request.  If you would like the full list, please let us know.

We accept Visa, Mastercard, Discover and Amex via Paypal. We offer a 7 day money back guarantee without any questions.
